title: Pretty Twisted Lies
description: Kiptyn McGrathKellie Dare was never meant to be mine. We existed in two different worlds. Mine was dark, dangerous and unpredictable. Herâ€™s held prestige, wealth and promise. I was never her white knight, but allowed her to believe it until the day she forgot she was mine. I quickly became the villain who would stop at nothing to keep her.
author: Emily Bowie
